constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 58 (Monday, March 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BERGMAN:
H.R. 2272.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article One, Section Eight of the United States
Constitution
[Page H1699]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

title: To authorize the Coast Guard to issue a certificate of documentation with a coastwise endorsement for the vessel WIDGEON, and for other purposes.
